description: This is a SQL migration script for setting up the core database schema for an airport passenger service platform. It includes table definitions, type creations, indexes, and triggers related to admin roles, passengers, KYC, OTP sessions, chatbot conversations, flights, facilities, bookings, feedback, grievances, notifications, and audit events.
calls: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trg_set_updated_at ON <table>
CREATE TRIGGER trg_set_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON <table> FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION set_updated_at()
